nodes.text: Plan 7 was the name of a battle maneuver that Clone Force 99 would execute in certain situations. When the squad was attempting to escape Galactic Empire forces on Bracca and found themselves trapped in the engine of a wrecked Venator-class Star Destroyer, Wrecker brought up using Plan 7, but Echo pointed out that it had nothing to do with their situation. The team came up with a different escape plan utilizing explosives Wrecker had salvaged from the wrecked starship's armory.
